title: Steadfast Champion (7U49)
text:
Set:	The Return of the King
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be Gandalf. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Gandalf.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and heal a companion 3 times.
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Lists: SXL, OBRL, EXL, MXL
